title: Peter
body:
Ah, dear friend!
It seems like you might have been lost, haven't you? 
But you can help a buddy out here, right?
[[Yes...|Peter.Help]]
[[Help yourself, medico.|Peter.HelpYourself]]
<<if !visited("Peter.Post") && $post>>
[[I have mail for you!|Peter.Post]]
<<endif>>
<<if !hasUpgrade(0)>>
[[I'd like to buy something|Peter.Upgrade]]
<<endif>>

title: Peter.Help
body:
Perfect, perfect!
So you see, I am a humble doctor trying to treat the people of this town.
[[Peter.Explanation]]

title: Peter.HelpYourself
body:
Woah aren't you a rude one?
You don't see me insulting your odd metalic body either.
Believe me I can and I would.
It's not like I'm not creative enough to insult you.
[[Peter.Explanation]]

title: Peter.Post
body:
Thank you, dear friend.
Some... friends sent me this medicine, 
I'm sure I'll get a good price for it around here.

title: Peter.Upgrade
body:
I have this wonderful dash that could help you move.
Of course you want that!
<<if !canBuyUpgrade()>>
    But from what I can see you're broke,
    come back when you have 6 coins.
    You earn them by doing small Tasks for the locals.
<<else>>
    And I'd like 6 of those coins you have on you, do we have a deal?
    -> Yes
        beautiful!
        here you go!
        <<buyUpgrade StaticSafeSystem 0>>
        just pess your action key and you should be dashing away
        have a great day, I know I will.
    -> Nevermind, no.
        Oh...
        I didn't expect that, but I respect your choices.
        Come back when you're wiser.
<<endif>>

title: Peter.Explanation
body:
But that's not important right now.
There are aspects beyond my power at work here.
It would be incredibly useful if you could just get rid of them.
Usually they woudn't really bother me,
but quite frankly I'm stuck on this rock with them.
[[Isn't that a bit selfish for a doctor|Peter.Selfish]]
[[Please elaborate|Peter.Elaborate]]

title: Peter.Selfish
body:
Might be, but that's none of your buisness
[[Peter.Elaborate]]

title: Peter.Elaborate
body:
There seems to be a plague going around, spreading from the north.
You would think that's exactly my job but this isn't a normal plague. 
I've seen plague in my life.
After research I've come to the conclusion that past the gate of the north there is something much worse hiding.
Say, have you heard of the Horsemen of the Apocalypse?
[[No, nothing|Peter.ExplainHorsemen]]
[[Yeah, I've heard some things|Peter.PestilenceElaboartion]]

title: Peter.ExplainHorsemen
body:
They are supernatural aspects of chaos and destruction.
Really nasty...
There are 4 of them:
Pestilence
War
Famine
and Death
[[Peter.PestilenceElaboartion]]

title: Peter.PestilenceElaboartion
body:
I expect the first Horseman, Pestilence, to hide up in the north.
You should try to break the barrier it errupted and defeat it!
Some of the people around here will surely be able to help.
-> How am I supposed to defeat a literal manifestation of destruction?
    Just hit it a bunch
    This timeline is way behind yours when it comes to tech
    The horsemen probably don't expect anything like you to turn up
    just that might give you the win
-> I'm on my way!
    That's the spirit!
[[Peter.ShopAdvertisment]]

title: Peter.ShopAdvertisment
body:
And what I almost forgot.
I have have some upgrades that might make the fight easier.
What would you think about a small dash?
Doing simple tasks for the people in the area gives you small coins.
Give them to me and the upgrade is yours.
Good luck on your travels.
